item.title: Deltascape how to customize admin/owner crown
item.dc:creator: @emtrescue emtrescue
item.description:
@emtrescue wrote:

the byte is the thing that tells which icon to use, just so happens reg delta has byte 6 set as an owner crown in the cache folder, thats all lol

item.title: Deltascape how to customize admin/owner crown
item.dc:creator: @emtrescue emtrescue
item.description:
@emtrescue wrote:

Look for

if(s != null && s.startsWith("@cr2@")) { s = s.substring(5); byte1 = #; }

change it too

if(s != null && s.startsWith("@cr2@")) { s = s.substring(5); byte1 = 6; }
(its located more than 1 place)

Still --this will allow you to change you admin and owner crown design )
location of the crown you can edit : files/sprites

i gave up on adding custom sprites lota coding you have to change

Read full topic
item.source: Deltascape how to customize admin/owner crown
